original_text: And the persons were sixteen thousand; of which the Lord'S tribute was thirty and two persons.
korean_text: 사람이 만 육천 명이라 그 중에서 여호와께 공물로 드린 자가 삼십이 명이니

sentences.original_text: And the persons were sixteen thousand
of which the Lord'S tribute was thirty and two persons
sentences.korean_translation: 그 중에서 주의 분깃은 서른두 사람이었더라
